title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 module uses Class.forName() function.
EB: The BidiUtil class should have a private constructor to prevent instantiation as it does not require nonstatic methods.
SR: To fix this issue, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
